page.title: 07Bradford as a tourist city
page.content: In 1984 more than 30,000 people came to Bradford for a{holiday.}This year why don't you join in and come to Bradford? Some famous{events}such as the World Speedway Finals and the National Breakdown Car Rally are held at Bradford. A holiday based at Bradford could be great fun.There are plenty of {museums},such as the new National Museum of Photography,Film and Televis ion,shops,sports grounds and much more.Go to Haworth and see where the Bronte sisters lived.Use Bradford as a centre for visits to the Dales,nearby Harewood House,Bolton Abbey,Shipley Glen and the Cow and Calf Rocks at Ilkley. You've seen Bradford on both ITV and BBC holiday programmes.So why not experience it yourself?
